column5: Just saying hello to everyone. Signed up today (really should have joined sooner). I keep my boat up on Gloucester pool (11 years now). Before that fished Sturgeon Lake for about 10 years. Spent time and $ collecting some JDM reels and rods. Really not much to add other than I'm kind of tackle crazy and can't wait until season opener. It's good to be here.
welcome aboard!
Welcomr to the OFC family brother...  Hang on!...You're in for the trip of your life...
Welcome SH, look forward to your posts!  Jen
Hi Slowhand. Glad to see you onboard. This is the best site bar none...Amazing talented people from all walks of life.
Welcome aboard Slowhand !!  Ah..the pool...
Welome aboard! You will have to enter OFC rehab in no time.
Great to see some new folks signing up today.   Soft water is just around the corner.  Hit 60F+ here today.  Welcome to the community.
Welcome
Hello there! lots of good people here and lots of info!
Welcome!  Always room for one more!

Ah..the pool...  Thanks for the welcome everybody. Irishfield: that's quite the picture: Buena Vista, Deer, Go Home, etc.. First time I've seen the Pool from the air!. Really does provide a different perspective. Thanks a lot. (I had a feeling I would be in the right place when I joined this board).
Welcome.  Your board handle....Are you an Eric Clapton fan by chance ?
Welcome to the board.  Looking forward to your posts. We like pics!
Welcome aboard Slowhand  Regads, Sam
Welcome!  Warning...this place is addictive!!
Let me be amung the first to welcome you aboard to our board...hehe
Welcome!  They aren't teasing when they say you might need rehab......If the information and pics don't get you, the humour will  bly
Welcome my friend to the show that never ends, remember, you can check out any time, but you never leave.  Looking forward to your posts and points of view  john
Howdy!
Welcome to the zoo...Mr. JR stole my line     so that's the best I can do right now  Maureen
I do a lot of bass fishing on the Pool, mayeb ill see you around this summer.
